data.name: Carvanha
data.flavorText: With its sturdy jaws and fangs, it can easily chomp wooden boats to splinters. It fights with Basculin over food.

abilities.name: Dark Lift
abilities.text: If Team Aqua's Carvanha has any Darkness Energy attached to it, the Retreat Cost for Team Aqua's Carvanha is 0.

attacks.name: Slow-Acting Poison
attacks.text: At the end of your opponent's next turn, the Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned.

data.name: Carvanha
data.flavorText: Each school has its own territory. Any intruders are mercilessly attacked with fangs bared.

data.name: Team Aqua's Carvanha

attacks.name: Fin Smack
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.

data.flavorText: You can't keep up with its movements underwater, can you? If you get caught in this whirlpool, there'll be no escape.

data.name: Carvanha
data.flavorText: They swarm any foe that invades their territory. Their sharp fangs can tear out boat hulls.

attacks.name: Confuse Ray
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Poison Fang
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned.

abilities.name: Rough Skin
abilities.text: If Carvanha is your Active Pokémon and is damaged by an opponent's attack (even if Carvanha is Knocked Out), put 1 damage counter on the Attacking Pokémon.

attacks.name: Rage
attacks.text: Does 10 damage plus 10 more damage for each damage counter on Carvanha.

data.name: Carvanha

attacks.name: Focus Energy
attacks.text: During your next turn, Carvanha's Bite attack's base damage is 40.

data.flavorText: They form packs to attack boats and rip out their hulls to sink them. They live in rivers in the jungle.

attacks.name: Reckless Charge
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, Carvanha does 10 damage to itself.

abilities.name: Rough Skin
abilities.text: If Carvanha is your Active Pokémon and is damaged by an opponent's attack (even if Carvanha is Knocked Out), put 1 damage counter on the Attacking Pokémon.

attacks.name: Big Bite
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon can't retreat until the end of your opponent's next turn.

data.name: Carvanha

attacks.name: Scary Face
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon can't attack or retreat during your opponent's next turn.

attacks.name: Whirlpool
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy attached to the Defending Pokémon.

data.flavorText: They swarm any foes that invades their territory. Their sharp fangs can tear out boat hulls.

data.name: Carvanha

attacks.name: Bite Away
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, choose a card from your opponent's hand without looking and discard it.

data.flavorText: They can swarm any foe that invades their territory. Their sharp fangs can tear out boat hulls.

data.name: Carvanha

attacks.name: Gnaw Through
attacks.text: Discard all Pokémon Tool cards from your opponent's Active Pokémon.

data.flavorText: If they scent the faintest trace of blood, they rush to attack en masse. When alone, they're rather cowardly.

data.name: Carvanha
data.flavorText: They're such cowards that they won't hunt alone. When five or so of them get together, they suddenly turn ferocious!

data.name: Carvanha

attacks.name: Agility
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to this Pokémon during your opponent's next turn.

data.flavorText: They're such cowards that they won't hunt alone. When five or so of them get together, they suddenly turn ferocious!

data.name: Carvanha
data.flavorText: With its sturdy jaws and fangs, it can easily chomp wooden boats to splinters. It fights with Basculin over food.

data.name: Carvanha
data.flavorText: With its sturdy jaws and fangs, it can easily chomp wooden boats to splinters. It fights with Basculin over food.

data.name: Carvanha
data.flavorText: These Pokémon have sharp fangs and powerful jaws. Sailors avoid Carvanha dens at all costs.

data.name: Carvanha
data.flavorText: It won't attack while it's alone—not even if it spots prey. Instead, it waits for other Carvanha to join it, and then the Pokémon attack as a group.

data.name: Carvanha
data.flavorText: These Pokémon have sharp fangs and powerful jaws. Sailors avoid Carvanha dens at all costs.

data.name: Carvanha

attacks.name: Reckless Charge
attacks.text: This Pokémon also does 10 damage to itself.

data.flavorText: These Pokémon have sharp fangs and powerful jaws. Sailors avoid Carvanha dens at all costs.
